A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From a fan of the original 3 films (4\,5&6) I thought number 7 was good \, but felt slightly like a re-run of the old films. This one\, The Last Jedi #8\, was awesome! The story was good\, the acting was great and the special effects rocked! I would see this again! I also highly recommend seeing it in Imax. I received movie money for a Christmas gift and used it to try it out. WOW for this kind of movie it was an experience. Like it much better than 3D.
